name: Friendly Payment Reminder
subject: Friendly Reminder: Invoice {{invoiceNumber}} Payment Due
body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This is a friendly reminder that invoice {{invoiceNumber}} for {{amount}} was due on {{dueDate}}. If you have already sent payment, please disregard this notice.

If you have any questions about this invoice, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
{{companyName}} Accounts Receivable

name: Second Payment Notice
subject: Second Notice: Outstanding Balance on Invoice {{invoiceNumber}}
body:
Dear {{customerName}},

Our records indicate that invoice {{invoiceNumber}} for {{amount}}, which was due on {{dueDate}}, remains unpaid. This is now {{daysPastDue}} days past due.

Please arrange payment at your earliest convenience. If there are any issues preventing payment, please contact us to discuss.

Thank you,
{{companyName}} Accounts Receivable

name: Urgent Payment Required
subject: URGENT: Immediate Payment Required - Invoice {{invoiceNumber}}
body:
Dear {{customerName}},

Despite our previous communications, invoice {{invoiceNumber}} for {{amount}} remains unpaid and is now {{daysPastDue}} days past due.

Immediate payment is required to avoid further action. Please contact us within 48 hours to arrange payment or discuss a payment plan.

Regards,
{{companyName}} Collections Department

name: Pre-Collection Warning
subject: Important: Your Account May Be Referred to Collections
body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This letter serves as formal notice that your account has an outstanding balance of {{amount}} that is {{daysPastDue}} days past due.

If payment is not received within 14 days of this notice, we may be compelled to refer your account to a third-party collection agency. This action may affect your credit standing.

To avoid this, please contact us immediately at {{contactPhone}} to arrange payment.

Sincerely,
{{companyName}} Collections Department

name: Final Notice Before Collections
subject: FINAL NOTICE: Account {{accountNumber}} - Immediate Action Required
body:
Dear {{customerName}},

This is your final notice regarding the outstanding balance of {{amount}} on account {{accountNumber}}, which is now {{daysPastDue}} days past due.

Unless full payment or an acceptable payment arrangement is received within 7 business days, your account will be referred to our collection agency. This may result in additional fees and a negative impact on your credit rating.

To resolve this matter, please contact our collections team at {{contactPhone}} immediately.

This communication is an attempt to collect a debt.

Sincerely,
{{companyName}} Legal & Collections
